thread.title: Arrow - Season Four Premiere Clip And 'Speedy' Poster
thread.title_full: Arrow - Season Four Premiere Clip And 'Speedy' Poster

title: Arrow - Season Four Premiere Clip And 'Speedy' Poster
text: Arrow - Season Four Premiere Clip And 'Speedy' Poster   2015.10.07 The CW have released a new clip from the Arrow Season 4 premiere featuring Willa Hollands Thea Queen, aka Speedy. Among the new clip is a new mini-poster of Speedy. The new season kicks off tonight, Wednesday, October 7th with the title episode 'Green Arrow.' Oliver and Felicitys blissful getaway is cut short when Thea and Laurel pay them a visit and tell Oliver they need his help back in Star City. The city has been attacked by Ghosts, assassins led by a dangerous man named Damien Darhk (guest star Neal McDonough). However, when Oliver returns, Diggle makes it very clear that he doesnt want Oliver on the team. Arrow stars Stephen Amell as Oliver Queen, Katie Cassidy as Dinah Laurel Lance, David Ramsey as John Diggle, Willa Holland as Thea Queen, Emily Bett Rickards as Felicity Smoak, John Barrowman as Malcom Merlyn, with Paul Blackthorne as Detective Lance. The series is executive produced by Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg and Sarah Schechter. The Arrow Season 4 premiere is scheduled to air on Wednesday, October 7 at 8:00pm ET/PT.
